mapper.select: select c.p_category_id,p.p_category_name,s.c_category_id,s.sub_name from c_category c, sub_category s, p_category p where c.c_category_id = s.c_category_id and p.p_category_id = c.p_category_id

select c.c_category_id, LISTAGG(s.sub_name,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY c.c_category_id) AS sub_name from p_category p inner join c_category c on p.p_category_id = c.p_category_id inner join sub_category s on c.c_category_id = s.c_category_id where p.p_category_id = #{p_category_id} GROUP BY c.c_category_id

select p_category_id, p_category_name, p_icon, p_update_date
from p_category
mapper.insert: insert into p_category(p_category_id, p_category_name, p_icon) values(#{p_category_id}, #{p_category_name}, 'p_icon')
